scripts.build:manager-site: rm -rf deploy/manager && mkdir -p deploy/manager && cp app.js styles.css _redirects deploy/manager/ && cp -R assets deploy/manager/assets && cp index.html deploy/manager/index.html
scripts.build:supervisor-site: rm -rf deploy/supervisor && mkdir -p deploy/supervisor && cp app.js styles.css _redirects deploy/supervisor/ && cp -R assets deploy/supervisor/assets && cp supervisor.html deploy/supervisor/index.html
scripts.build:sites: npm run build:manager-site && npm run build:supervisor-site
